content:
On my PR #30648, the "lint and suggest" CI step fails (repeatedly), but there doesn't seem to be any actual failure message in the CI output that I can see; just "Error: Process completed with exit code 1" at the end.

(I'm confused what's going on with this PR altogether. Riccardo bors-merged it earlier today; but when I checked back on it several hours later to see why bors hadn't completed, there was a warning saying "merge conflict". Hitting the auto-merge-master button did not show any actual git conflicts, but since then, it has consistently failed CI with this linting error.)

I believe the bors result "conflict" means "there was a conflict merging all the PRs in this bors match" (i.e., this is not about your PR but about its interaction with the other PRs in the batch). That said, I agree the bors error could and should be more telling here.
The CI error itself seems to be in the "install reviewdog" step, i.e. it's unrelated to your PR. If retrying does not fix it, please make noise in a separate zulip thread!
There's an ongoing issue at GitHub which is probably related: #rss > GitHub Status - Incident History @ ðŸ’¬

It seems to work again now, so maybe the GitHub issue was indeed the cause, thanks!

Could some kind maintainer put #30648 back on the queue? (It got automatically un-queued when I merged master.)
